short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download a customized resume perfectly crafted for your dream job description.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing Resumer, a powerful Chrome extension revolutionizing the job application process. Our extension seamlessly extracts job descriptions from the current tab, leveraging advanced algorithms to optimize user details for crafting the perfect resume. By interfacing with our API endpoints, Resumer tailors resumes to match specific job requirements, ensuring users stand out in competitive job markets.
